descriptionHtml:
Nathalia Follower

This is my first Mod, so I hope you like it
Este es mi primer Mod, espero que les guste

Ubicación/Location
Riverwood: Sleeping Giant Inn
Cause Boscoso: Posada el Gigante Dormido

Wear an Amulet of Mara and ask her to marry you
Lleva un amuleto de Mara y pidele que se case contigo

She is an essential character (Can´t Die)
Ella es un personaje esencial (No puede Morir)


_________________________________________________________________________________________

Mods recomendados que uso para Nathalia:
Recommended mods that I use with Nathalia:

Armor/Armadura:
CBBE Daedric Female
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6316

Face/Rostro:
Better Females by Bella
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Body/Cuerpo:
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666


_________________________________________________________________________________________

To play as Nathalia/Para jugar como Nathalia:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11106&navtag=file/images.php?id=11106&tab=3

Nathalia lvl 1 in Helgen
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11313


Greetings From Mexico
Saludos desde México

Enjoy! / Disfrutalo!
author: Vitek202
